title: metroguessr
details: Interactive online game where the player selects between several cities to play and attempts to guess as many metro stations of that city within a set timeframe.
summary: An engaging city-based game where players guess metro stations, boasting over 10,000 users and featured in leading publications.

title: Engenious
details: Bespoke website developed for Engenious, a recruitment company specialised in the construction industry
summary: A tailored website for Engenious, a construction recruitment firm, enhancing their online presence and streamlining the recruitment process.

title: Hoops to Glory
details: Incremental clicker game with a NBA draft theme.
summary: A captivating incremental clicker game where players manage training and career decisions to secure the top NBA draft pick.
